Varka's Messenger Naran Ashanuk:
Was this sent by Helmut of Goddard? I thank you for coming so far to deliver this precious item. We Varkas do not forget those who have been of service to us.
In fact, you seem very capable. We Varkas have been locked in a protracted war against the Ketra Orcs. Will you join us? As our friend, you would earn our lifelong loyalty...
